comments.author: Marcel Reutegger
comments.body:
Committed in revision: 541664

There's now a link on the entry page of the web application to the search page.

I've also added all available text extractors to the workspace template configuration in repository.xml and made the required changes to get support for rep:excerpt() with highlighting.

description: The web application should have a search page that shows how to use the query features in jackrabbit.
